code: public String performMethod(byte[] body, String state, String traceId) {     String key = UUID.randomUUID().toString().     Entity traceEntity = AWSXRay.getGlobalRecorder().getTraceEntity().     traceEntity.putMetadata("state", state).     Exchange newExchange = targetEndpoint.createExchange(ExchangePattern.InOnly).     newExchange.getIn().setBody(body).     newExchange.getIn().setHeader("KEY", key).     newExchange.getIn().setHeader(XRayTracer.XRAY_TRACE_ID, traceId).     newExchange.getIn().setHeader(XRayTracer.XRAY_TRACE_ENTITY, traceEntity).     template.asyncSend(targetEndpoint, newExchange).     return key. }
